thread.title: MyNBA2K16 Available Now on iOS and Android Devices
thread.title_full: MyNBA2K16 Available Now on iOS and Android Devices

author: Steve_OS
title: MyNBA2K16 Available Now on iOS and Android Devices
text: MyNBA2K16 Available Now on iOS and Android Devices 07:30 AM - October 1, 2015 by Steve_OS MyNBA2K16 is available now for iOS and Android devices, with Indiana Pacers power forward Paul George as the apps cover athlete. check out the trailer here . Stay connected to the console on the go Earn Virtual Currency and enter locker codes for NBA 2K16 Connect to various modes of NBA 2K16 through the app Access the 2K Sports Store store to pick up fresh gear Get rewards for both MyNBA2K16 and NBA 2K16 through a new Goals system Ball your own way in the collectible card game MyTEAM Mobile Collect their favorite NBA player cards Challenge other competitors across the world in Quick Games, season tournaments and in-game special events Boost stats with specialization power-ups, charge stats, and assign special abilities to any cards Customize cards like never before so every card feels unique With a fresh new look and feel and more social connectivity options than ever before, MyNBA2K16 with Paul George at the helm creates a comprehensive mobile experience for fans that want to stay close to the game both at home and on the go. Platform: Android / iOS Votes for game: 1 - View All MyNBA2K16 Videos
